Docs.summary: Receives call backs for changes to content.

remarks.para: Receives call backs for changes to content. Must be implemented by objects which are added to a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool DeliverSelfNotifications() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns true if this observer is interested receiving self-change notifications.

remarks.para:
Returns true if this observer is interested receiving self-change notifications.
Subclasses should override this method to indicate whether the observer is interested in receiving notifications for changes that it made to the content itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DispatchChange(bool selfChange) cil managed

Docs.param: True if this is a self-change notification.
Docs.summary: Dispatches a change notification to the observer.

remarks.para: Dispatches a change notification to the observer.
If a was supplied to the constructor, then a call to the method is posted to the handler's message queue. Otherwise, the method is invoked immediately on this thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DispatchChange (bool selfChange, Android.Net.Uri uri);

Docs.param: True if this is a self-change notification.
The Uri of the changed content, or null if unknown.
Docs.summary: Dispatches a change notification to the observer.

remarks.para: Dispatches a change notification to the observer. Includes the changed content Uri when available.
If a was supplied to the constructor, then a call to the method is posted to the handler's message queue. Otherwise, the method is invoked immediately on this thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnChange(bool selfChange) cil managed

Docs.param: True if this is a self-change notification.
Docs.summary: This method is called when a content change occurs.

remarks.para: This method is called when a content change occurs.
Subclasses should override this method to handle content changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnChange (bool selfChange, Android.Net.Uri uri);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnChange(bool selfChange, class Android.Net.Uri uri) cil managed

Docs.param: True if this is a self-change notification.
The Uri of the changed content, or null if unknown.
Docs.summary: This method is called when a content change occurs.

remarks.para: This method is called when a content change occurs. Includes the changed content Uri when available.

Subclasses should override this method to handle content changes. To ensure correct operation on older versions of the framework that did not provide a Uri argument, applications should also implement the overload of this method whenever they implement the overload.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
